items.sentence: Tom said that he couldn\'t remember his French teacher\'s name.
Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
Didn\'t you know Tom was planning to go to Australia with Mary?
It might be more difficult to do that than you think it\'ll be.
When do you want me to send these invitations to our customers?
Tom and Mary held hands and watched the sun set over the ocean.
Tom and Mary never had trouble finding something to talk about.
Tom put his hand on Mary\'s forehead to see if she had a fever.
Why don\'t you quit what you\'re doing and come out for a walk?
Tom lay awake half the night, thinking about what he should do.
